{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated \$1.9M in 2019-2020 on contracts with HUMAN LOGISTICS.
{{< /entity_summary >}}

{{< details summary="See original contracts and amendments" panel_body_class="vendor-names-list" >}}
